title: Get Good: @itspikaaaa v JaVale McGee on NBA 2K25
description: Pro baller JaVale McGee takes on gaming legend @itspikaaa in the ultimate NBA 2K25 showdown! Watch as real-world hoops skills clash with competitive gaming mastery in this special "Court to Console" episode. Only one can claim the trophy - let the battle begin!
excerpt: Pro baller JaVale McGee takes on gaming legend @itspikaaa in the ultimate NBA 2K25 showdown! Watch as real-world hoops skills clash with competitive gaming mastery in this special "Court to Console" episode. Only one can claim the trophy - let the battle begin!
text: Pro baller JaVale McGee takes on gaming legend @itspikaaa in the ultimate NBA 2K25 showdown! Watch as real-world hoops skills clash with competitive gaming mastery in this special "Court to Console" episode. Only one can claim the trophy - let the battle begin!By Tiffany Tse on February 16, 2025 at 9:00AM PST
html:
Pro baller JaVale McGee takes on gaming legend @itspikaaa in the ultimate NBA 2K25 showdown! Watch as real-world hoops skills clash with competitive gaming mastery in this special "Court to Console" episode. Only one can claim the trophy - let the battle begin!

By Tiffany Tse on February 16, 2025 at 9:00AM PST
